body:
$AAPL $SPY $FB $AMZN $NFLX  
short the market at SQQQ 
  
 • markets are returning to Feb 15, 2020. Pre-COVID fundamentals. 📉
$AAPL add more....

$INTC might be forced to review its 2022 revenue outlook amid concerns around PC sales and shrinking market share in servers, Wedbush Securities said Thursday.  
  
"We expect another disappointing earnings call from $INTC  with the primary question, in our view, being whether or not $INTC lowers its revenue guidance for the year this quarter, or holds onto an outlook that increasingly looks overly aggressive in light of deteriorating PC dynamics and Intel share loss in the server market," Wedbush Analyst Matt Bryson said in a note to clients.  
  
According to the firm, the semiconductor giant "seems almost certain" to lose further market share as constraints for $AMD ease and $AAPL 
continues to move to internally designed chips.

$AAPL Powell needs to be investigated. Whole extended family is probably short selling every time he speaks, gives them the heads up the night before. Case made, where do I file a police report. I've been robbed by the prince of thieves.
$AAPL this gonna drop like a rock soon
@Maximatim unlikely, 50 cent hike will have to come to maintain fed fear ops. Else no one will take them seriously. $aapl
$AAPL layering on the behemoth too - started next weeks 150 puts at .60 and STO 170/172.5 CS at .90 to cover the expense
$AAPL ok final call place your bets, closing price, 20 cent range allowed. $166.8 +- 20 cents.
$AAPL investors running scared from hundreds of billions in tech profits over inflation fears and think they’ll do better where????   What a bunch of gutless cowards.

$PYPL Investors are bailing before earnings 😂 
$AAPL $AMD $QQQ $SPY
$AAPL $QQQ Going to moon if Jerome Powell raises interest rates only .25
$AAPL thanks to the fed, my options fucked
$AAPL rates going up. Chapter 11 for Apple now. So damn stupid and panic stricken. 95% of the population has no idea about the Fed funds rate, etc.

$AAPL  
Never bet against Apple.
